TEXT_LIFETIME_PLAN: You're currently on a lifetime FastComments plan due to the coupon code you used. If you'd like to switch to a monthly plan with more traffic contact support.
TEXT_BILLING_HANDLED_EXTERNALLY: Billing information for this tenant is handled externally. If you wish to make changes to your plan or make a payment, reach out to support.
TEXT_BILLING_UP_TO_DATE: Looks like your billing info is currently up to date.
TEXT_BILLING_ISSUE: Looks like there is an issue with your current billing info.
TEXT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thanks for using FastComments. Your information is now secured and subscription has been updated.
TEXT_CARD_NOT_CHARGED_NOW: Your card won't be charged now unless you change plans.
TEXT_CARD_CHARGED_NOW: Your card will be charged now. If you've picked Flex, it will be charged at the end of the billing cycle depending on your usage.
TEXT_PAYMENT_INFO_NOTE: This information will be used for scheduled billing. Payment information is handed off to Stripe - we do not store it.
